author: parithosh
content:
Goerli shadowfork 0 (goerli-sf-0) is live and successful ðŸ˜„
https://dora.goerli-sf-0.ethpandaops.io/

We passed the dencun fork epoch recently. Seems like all the clients made it through the shadowfork and the dencun fork without issues. 

We have some basic blob txs in the network. There are no tx-spammers in the network, so all the transaction load is from goerli canonical. I'm running some validator exits to have more funds for blob spamming. I'll also start up xatu so we have some blob/block processing metrics. This means the data should showcase how goerli would perform if all we did was add blobs to the existing network.

author: parithosh
content: ^we did have issues with erigon, i think the fault may be config related - it might have completed syncing but was still not done downloading stuff in the background. we will trigae if its a real issue.
